house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1987 has 5 bedroom(s), 4 bath(s) , 2 car attached garage and approximately 4401 square feet of living area. Rooms include den, family room, master bedroom. Features include view, private pool, air conditioning, french doors, skylights.
house_listing.firm_name: Shelton & Assoc Re Lic. Real Estate Broker
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Dishwasher, French Doors, Kitchen Island, Outdoor Grill, Pantry,Skylights, Smoke Detector, Trash Compacter
